go_data.justification: TGFbeta1 is involved in the development of the mouse heart, specifically in eliciting endothelial-mesenchymal transformation during the formation of endocardial cushion tissue.
Immunohistochemical examination revealed an extracellular fibrillar deposition of TGFbeta1 in developing endocardial cushion tissue.
TGFbeta1 restored the inhibitory effect of Ab39, indicating its role as a growth factor.
TGFbetas, including TGFbeta1, play a role in eliciting endothelial-mesenchymal transformation during the formation of endocardial cushion tissue.
